Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @return Returns null if no reason is provided or due to the usage of a deprecated api; Otherwise, the reason.
          
          
            
                 * @return Returns the reason if provided, otherwise null.
          
      
    
    
  

Other plugins shouldn't be firing this event on our behalf, so we probably shouldn't assume they are.

I think the optimal solution is to potentially wrap this Long in an Optional. It beats readers over the head with the intent of the field.
Would opt against 0 - easy to mess up. Null would at least cause things to blow up in the case where there is no timestamp.
